      • getTrivia

        public java.util.List<Question> getTrivia(int limit,
                                          Category category,
                                          Type type,
                                          Encoding encoding,
                                          Difficulty difficulty)
                                   throws TokenNotFoundException
        (Synchronous) Get the Trivia Questions
        Parameters:
        limit - Limit to number of questions to fetch
        category - The Category of the Question Ex Category.SCIENCE
        type - The Type of Question Ex Type.BOOLEAN
        encoding - The Encoding in which Question is Returned Ex Encoding.BASE64
        difficulty - The Difficulty of the Question Ex Difficulty.HARD
        Returns:
        The List of Questions For Trivia
        Throws:
        TokenNotFoundException - When Token is Either Invalid or Empty

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getTrivia

                                   throws TokenNotFoundException

        Parameters:
        limit - the number of questions to fetch
        Returns:
        Questions for Trivia Equal to Limit

        TokenNotFoundException - When Token is Invalid or Empty

      • getTriviaAsync

        public void getTriviaAsync(int limit,
                           Category category,
                           Type type,
                           Encoding encoding,
                           Difficulty difficulty,
                           QuestionFetched questionFetched)
        (Asynchronous) Get the Trivia Questions
        Parameters:
        limit - The Number Of Questions to Fetch
        category - The Category of the Question Ex Category.SCIENCE
        type - The Type of Question Ex Type.BOOLEAN
        encoding - The Encoding in which Question is Returned Ex Encoding.BASE64
        difficulty - The Difficulty of the Question Ex Difficulty.HARD
        questionFetched - The QuestionFetched Implementation // Using Lambda getTriviaAsync((questions)->{ for (Question question : questions) { question.getQuestion() } });
